column13:
Barrominas Brazilian Shampoo - Imported (300 ml) Price: Rs.2600

Barrominas Brazilian Shampoo Argan Shine for Damaged Hair 300ml.The SHINE Barrominas ARGAN Shampoo is ideal for damaged and chemically treated hair. His formula restores softness to life and letting your hair hydrated and shiny look because of Argan oil is rich in omega 3 and 9 and vitamin E which has antioxidant anti-aging and protective action against dryness. Leaving hair silky naturally hydrated restoring vitality and softness to the hair. The product line Argan Shine have high moisturizing power it returns to life and softness to hair damaged and chemically treated. The Argan oil is rich in omega 3 and 9 and vitamin E which has antioxidant and anti aging and improves the elasticity of the wires. Penetrates the hair shaft and follicle repairing all damage. Locks of hair moisture and provides shine. Controls frizz. It is very soft and is instantly absorbed without leaving greasy hair. As an additional benefit helps keep colored hair color for longer. Its benefits are realized from the first application. Result: hair with intense shine and luminous healthy and deeply hydrated.
